      • onActionBarToggled

        public void onActionBarToggled(boolean showing)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: AbstractParentWidget
        Note individual MapWidgets do not need to register for action bar events. They simply need to implement AtakMapView.OnActionBarToggledListener amd they will be notified via thier parent MapWidget/container
        Overrides:
        onActionBarToggled in class AbstractParentWidget
        Parameters:
        showing - true if the action bar is showing
